title: Auto-Termination Validation
test_description: Check auto-termination setting - Auto-termination configured with autotermination_minutes â‰¤ 120 and > 0

api_calls.name: get_cluster_info
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const autoTermMinutes = responseData.autotermination_minutes || 0; const clusterName = responseData.cluster_name || 'Unknown'; logger.debug('Cluster auto-termination:', { autoTermMinutes, clusterName }); return { ...currentVariables, auto_termination_minutes: autoTermMinutes, cluster_name: clusterName }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_info; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to get cluster information', code: 'CLUSTER_INFO_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; } const autoTermMinutes = clusterStep.data?.autotermination_minutes || 0; const clusterName = clusterStep.data?.cluster_name || 'Unknown'; if (clusterStep.status !== 200) { let errorMessage = 'Auto-termination validation failed'; if (clusterStep.status === 404) { errorMessage = 'Cluster not found'; } else if (clusterStep.status === 403) { errorMessage = 'Permission denied accessing cluster'; } else { errorMessage = `API error: ${clusterStep.status}`; } return { status: 'fail', message: errorMessage, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_API_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; } if (autoTermMinutes === undefined || autoTermMinutes === null) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to get cluster auto-termination setting', code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; } const autoTermValid = (autoTermMinutes <= 120 && autoTermMinutes > 0); const isConfigured = autoTermMinutes > 0; const isWithinLimit = autoTermMinutes <= 120; if (!isConfigured) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Auto-termination is not configured (0 minutes)', code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_NOT_CONFIGURED', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; } if (!isWithinLimit) { return { status: 'fail', message: `Auto-termination exceeds maximum limit (${autoTermMinutes} > 120 minutes)`, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_EXCEEDS_LIMIT', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; } return { status: 'pass', message: `Auto-termination validation passed: ${autoTermMinutes} minutes`, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_VALIDATED', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation' }; }
